item.title: Asmodeus's Dread Authority
item.fluff: Asmodeus invests you with the authority he uses to rule the Nine Hells

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); The boon's level +5 vs. Will
Hit: The target is subject to your dread authority (save ends).
While subject to your authority, you can slide the target 1 square at the start of each of its turns.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (creature subject to your dread authority, or a devil); The target chooses to either fall prone or take 5 fire damage. A devil does not benefit from resists against this damage.

item.title: Avandra's Blessing of Confidence
item.fluff: Individuals blessed by Avandra gain an indomitable confidence in their own capabilities, allowing them to call upon teir inner stregnth to augment themselves

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► You gain resist 5 all against opportunity attacks. Level 13: Resist 10 all. Level 23: Resist 15 all. ► You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that render you dazed, dominated, immobilized, restrained, slowed, or stunned.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Escape
item.fluff: Gambits that rely on luck draw boons from Avandra, and individuals blessed by her are impossible to corner

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You started your turn adjacent to two or more enemies

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Storms
item.fluff: Like an ocean storm, change is both inevitable and rarely controllable, but to those who embrace change rather than fight it, Avandra occasionally grants the power to influence events

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a skill check and don't like the result
Effect: You reroll the skill check and use the second result, even if it's lower.
Level 21: If the triggering skill check still fails, you regain the use of this power when you take a short rest.

item.title: Bahamut's Protective Ward
item.fluff: Bahamut grants his boon to heroes who shield the weak from the strong, and individuals who fight in Bahamut's name are beacons of hope and protection

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies provoke opportunity attacks from you if they make an attack that does not include you as a target.
Level 13: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.
Level 23: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.
